mapper.select: select distinct t3.id, t3.name, t3.type, t3.path, t3.component, t3.title, t3.parent_id, t3.frame, t3.cache, t3.icon, t3.`order`, t3.visible, t3.perms, t3.remark, t3.status, t3.create_by, t3.create_time, t3.update_by, t3.update_time from sys_user_role t1 left join sys_role_resource t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id left join sys_resource t3 on t2.resource_id = t3.id where t1.user_id = #{userId}
